MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The outline of buildings or mountains defined against the sky.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 城市建筑或山脉在天空映衬下形成的轮廓线。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The city's skyline is constantly changing with new skyscrapers.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这座城市的摩天大楼不断增多，天际线也在不断变化。
